main.name: Hangyu Wang
main.occupation: Fall co-op and Future full-time position as Software Engineer
main.bio: I am a kind, passionate, collaborative problem-solver and is looking for a new opportunity to make a difference. I have enclosed a copy of my resume for your consideration. Please don’t hesitate to contact me at any time on the details provided above.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you!

resume.skillmessage:
I hold various skills on Computer Science, like NodeJS, React, Postgres SQL, mongoDB, Matlab, Apollo GraphQL, AWS EC2, JQuery, Java, JavaScript, C/C++, SQL, HTML, CSS, Python.
 And Here are the skills I often use.

work.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
work.description:
• Developed and implemented new ERP systems and upgraded existing ones depending on project needs
• Debugged and implemented code as needed
• Tested the integration of the workflow on created ERP System
• Communicated often with clients about requirements and gave updates of work

work.title: Researcher Intern
work.description:
• Designed a general circuit Partial TMR algorithm based on data mining algorithm
• Extracted circuit netlist information according to hardware design
• Generated hardware topology connection relationship by using the netlist information
•Determined the component needed to conduct TMR according to the topology connection data processed by improved PageRank algorithm
•Verified the efficiency of the method by hardware test on the on-orbit simulation platform

• Debugged and implemented code as needed
• Created the operation manual of the platform for clients
